posts.post_content: This is not ramp unless you're reducing the cost somehow. It's not good mana fixing either, in that unless you're playing mono-red you're probably reducing your pool of playable spells (and if you're mono-red, you don't need fixing). It's good, but there aren't a lot of spells for this to fuel at the moment.
